EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber} Required AOG Information for SPEC2000, Tail # {!Case.Aircraft_Tail_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
All AOG Orders must be submitted through the AOG Team. Please note that AOG Orders should not be placed through SPEC2000. Orders placed through SPEC2000 can take up to 48 hours before becoming visible in our system.
If you are requesting this order to be changed to AOG status please provide the following:
Tail Number: Next Scheduled Flight out: Aircraft Location: Aircraft Type: End user name: Hard copy purchase order:
Once we have received the above required information we will change your order to AOG status and proceed with our AOG Process.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
